name: The Anglers
overview: The Anglers is a 2 player only competitive action game for the Commodore 64, in which you and a friend try to catch the most fish. The winner is whoever catches the most fish after a set score. You can change the difficulty by adding boats and other sea critters that can get in your wey. The game was developed by Tai Bush and published in the March 1989 issue of COMPUTE!'S Gazette (Issue #69).
